issue.title: twitter.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://twitter.com/home](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fhome) ### Comment > sidebar ads are routinely not blocked on twitter. reinstalling, updating filters, etc does nothing, this is an issue i have always had with adguard on all devices and never on ublock and the issue keeps getting closed as if it's unique but it's not unique or an edge case at all it is just intermittent ### Screenshots

issue.title: false positive
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Content Blocker

### AdGuard version

nightly

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.iptunnels.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
falsepositive, could you remove it iptunnels site from list https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/422841fd675b13a838d899d907a934d14ac78530/BaseFilter/sections/content_blocker.txt#L540

issue.title: twitter.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://twitter.com/home](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fhome) ### Comment > sidebar ads are routinely not blocked on twitter. reinstalling, updating filters, etc does nothing, this is an issue i have always had with adguard on all devices and never on ublock and the issue keeps getting closed as if it's unique but it's not unique or an edge case at all it is just intermittent ### Screenshots
